Uses of Class
ltl.BinaryFormula

Packages that use BinaryFormula 
Package Description
ltl  
v  

  • Uses of BinaryFormula in ltl

    Subclasses of BinaryFormula in ltl 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  And
    This class represents an LTL formula that is a conjuction (and) of two formulas.
    class  Or
    This class represents an LTL formula that is an Or formula.
    class  Until
    This class represents an LTL formula that is an until formula.
    class  WeakUntil
    This class represents an LTL formula that is a weak until formula.

  • Uses of BinaryFormula in v

    Methods in v with parameters of type BinaryFormula 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Formula FormulaVisitor.visit​(BinaryFormula binaryFormula)
    Visits a Binary LTL formula
    Firstly, the left and right subformulas are visited and then on the traversal back up a new Formula is generated consisting of the type of Binary formula this formula is and it's left and right subformulas
    Formula Visitor.visit​(BinaryFormula binaryFormula)
    Visits a generic binary LTL formula
